channel.title: dotNET Weekly - Week undefined Year undefined

item.title: Learn to build HTTP APIs with .NET
item.content:encoded: ASP.NET makes it easy to build HTTP services that reach a broad range of clients, including browsers and mobile devices. Whether you’re new to .NET or an old pro, we’ve got a lot of fresh videos, tutorials, and documentation to help you learn how to build great HTTP APIs.

item.title: .NET Interactive with SQL! .NET Notebooks in Visual Studio Code
item.content:encoded:
In our last post, we announced that you can create .NET Notebooks in Visual Studio Code. Today we are announcing that .NET Interactive now ships with T-SQL support in addition to C#, F#, PowerShell, JavaScript, and HTML.
The .NET Interactive team has collaborated with the Azure Data Studio team to bring SQL integration to .NET Notebooks. SQL notebooks combine the benefits of querying data with the rich visualization of notebooks.

item.title: https://azureai.devpost.com/
item.content:encoded:
Azure AI puts artificial intelligence and machine learning at the fingertips of every developer. Looking to build ML models?
First Place • $10,000 USD • 30 min. virtual meeting with Azure AI engineering leads • Featured on Azure website & blog • $1,500 Azure credits
Second Place • $5,000 USD • Featured on Azure website & blog • $1,500 Azure credits
Third Place • $2,500 USD • Featured on Azure website & blog • $1,500 Azure credits
Popular choice (5) • $200 USD
First 50 eligible submissions (50) • $50 USD - One per eligible entry (not per teammate)
